data.description: Experience the opportunity to live in Atlanta's coveted Buckhead neighborhood near Lenox Mall! NO RENTAL RESTRICTIONS and NO WAITLIST on long term rentals over 1 year! This freshly remodeled third-floor unit in the private gated community of Lenox Heights offers two generous bedroom suites, complete with new flooring throughout, and an open floor plan with bedroom suites on either side creating the perfect roommate floor plan. This unit further offers the convenience of a private balcony and secure, and updated bathrooms. Underground parking within a gated garage, providing two side-by-side designated spaces located just across from the complex's access door and elevator. The community itself offers an array of amenities, including a gated entrance with security, a clubhouse, pool, tennis courts, a fitness center, a pet-friendly walking area, and even a catering kitchen. Additionally, you'll have access to ample green spaces ideal for leisurely morning strolls. water, sewer and trash removal are included! Walkability is exceptional, with shops, restaurants, MARTA transportation, and more all within a short distance. Phipps Plaza is a mere 2 miles away, and major highways like I-85, I-75, and GA-400 are just minutes from your doorstep. The airport is a convenient 20-minute drive, making this location in Atlanta truly unbeatable.
